SELECT S.AUCTION_NO AS auctionNo, A.AUCTION_PRODUCT AS auctionProduct, A.AUCTION_PRICE AS auctionPrice, A.AUCTION_END AS auctionEnd FROM SELL_FORM S LEFT JOIN AUCTION A ON (S.AUCTION_NO=A.AUCTION_NO) WHERE A.FARM_NO=#{farmNo}
AND A.auction_product like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND A.auction_no like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT BUY_NO AS buyNo, USER_NO AS userNo, FARM_NO AS farmNo, ORDER_NO AS orderNo, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_COUNT AS productCount, PAY_AMOUNT AS payAmount, PURCHASE_DATE AS purchaseDate, D_NAME AS dName FROM PURCHASELIST P LEFT JOIN DELIVERY D ON (P.D_CODE=D.D_CODE) WHERE FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND NOT REFUND_YN ='Y'
AND user_no like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND product_name like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASELIST WHERE FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND NOT REFUND_YN ='Y'
AND user_no like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND product_name like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT user_no AS userNo, user_id AS userId, user_Pwd AS userPwd, user_Name AS userName, user_Nick AS userNick, user_Email AS userEmail, user_Phone AS userPhone, user_Address_Main AS userAddressMain, user_Address_Sub AS userAddressSub, user_EnrollDate AS userEnrollDate, user_End_YN AS userEndYN, rating AS rating
FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO=#{_parameter}
SELECT AUCTION_NO AS auctionNo, AUCTION_PRODUCT AS auctionProduct, AUCTION_PRICE AS auctionPrice, AUCTION_END AS auctionEnd FROM AUCTION WHERE FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND AUCTION_PRODUCT=#{productName}
mapper.update: UPDATE PURCHASELIST SET D_CODE=#{deliveryStatus} WHERE BUY_NO=#{buyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT Delivery_No AS deliveryNo, buy_No AS buyNo, delivery_Company AS deliveryCompany, delivery_Num AS deliveryNum, delivery_Date AS deliveryDate, del_YN AS delYN, delivery_Status AS deliveryStatus FROM DELIVERY_MANAGEMENT WHERE BUY_NO =#{_parameter} ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, NOTICE_REGDATE AS noticeRegdate, FARM_NO AS farmNo, NOTICE_COUNT AS noticeCount, NOTICE_END_YN AS noticeEndYN, NOTICE_CODE AS noticeCode, NOTICE_CATEGORY AS noticeCategory FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_CODE IN ('A','F') AND NOTICE_END_YN='N'
AND NOTICE_TITLE like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND NOTICE_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_CODE IN ('A','F') AND NOTICE_END_YN='N'
AND NOTICE_TITLE like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND NOTICE_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT Q.QUESTION_USER_NO AS questionNo, Q.QUESTION_USER_TITLE AS questionTitle, Q.QUESTION_USER_CONTENT AS questionContent, Q.QUESTION_USER_REGDATE AS questionRegdate, Q.USER_NO AS userNo, M.USER_NAME AS userName, M.USER_ID AS userId, Q.QUESTIONPHOTO_NO AS questionPhotoNo, Q.FARM_NO AS farmNo
FROM QUESTION_USER Q LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO=Q.USER_NO) WHERE QUESTION_USER_CODE='Q-2' AND QUESTION_USER_CLASSIFY='F' AND FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND QUESTION_USER_END_YN='N'
AND Q.QUESTION_USER_TITLE like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND Q.QUESTION_USER_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND M.USER_NAME like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION_USER Q LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.USER_NO=Q.USER_NO) WHERE QUESTION_USER_CODE='Q-2' AND QUESTION_USER_CLASSIFY='F' AND FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND QUESTION_USER_END_YN='N'
AND Q.QUESTION_USER_TITLE like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND Q.QUESTION_USER_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND M.USER_NAME like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT R.REFUND_NO AS refundNo, R.BUY_NO AS buyNo, R.USER_NO AS userNo, R.FARM_NO AS farmNo, R.FARM_YN AS farmYN, Q.QUESTION_USER_NO AS questionUserNo, Q.QUESTION_USER_TITLE AS questionUserTitle, Q.QUESTION_USER_CONTENT AS questionUserContent, Q.QUESTION_USER_REGDATE AS questionUserRegdate, Q.ORDER_NO AS orderNo FROM REFUND R LEFT JOIN QUESTION_USER Q ON(R.QUESTION_USER_NO=Q.QUESTION_USER_NO) WHERE R.FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND Q.QUESTION_USER_END_YN='N' AND R.DEL_YN='N'
AND Q.ORDER_NO like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND R.USER_NO like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REFUND R LEFT JOIN QUESTION_USER Q ON(R.QUESTION_USER_NO=Q.QUESTION_USER_NO) WHERE R.FARM_NO=#{farmNo} AND Q.QUESTION_USER_END_YN='N' AND R.DEL_YN='N'
AND Q.ORDER_NO like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND R.USER_NO like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'

SELECT BUY_NO AS buyNo, USER_NO AS userNo, FARM_NO AS farmNo, ORDER_NO AS orderNo, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_COUNT AS productCount, PAY_AMOUNT AS payAmount, PURCHASE_DATE AS purchaseDate, D_CODE AS dName FROM PURCHASELIST WHERE ORDER_NO = #{_parameter}

SELECT R.REFUND_NO AS refundNo, R.BUY_NO AS buyNo, R.USER_NO AS userNo, R.FARM_NO AS farmNo, R.FARM_YN AS farmYN, Q.QUESTION_USER_NO AS questionUserNo, Q.QUESTION_USER_TITLE AS questionUserTitle, Q.QUESTION_USER_CONTENT AS questionUserContent, Q.QUESTION_USER_REGDATE AS questionUserRegdate, Q.ORDER_NO AS orderNo FROM REFUND R LEFT JOIN QUESTION_USER Q ON(R.QUESTION_USER_NO=Q.QUESTION_USER_NO) WHERE R.FARM_NO=#{_paremeter} AND Q.QUESTION_USER_END_YN='N' AND R.DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT B.BID_NO AS bidNo, B.AUCTION_NO AS auctionNo, B.BID_DATE AS bidDate, A.FARM_NO AS farmNo, A.AUCTION_PRODUCT AS auctionProduct from BID B LEFT JOIN AUCTION A on (B.AUCTION_NO = A.AUCTION_NO) WHERE FARM_NO=#{_parameter} ORDER BY BID_DATE DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, SUM(PRODUCT_COUNT) AS prodictCount FROM PURCHASELIST WHERE FARM_NO=#{farmNo}
AND PRODUCT_NAME IN (#{product1})
AND PRODUCT_NAME IN (#{product1},#{product2})
AND PRODUCT_NAME IN (#{product1},#{product2},#{product3})
AND PRODUCT_NAME IN (#{product1},#{product2},#{product3},#{product4})
AND PRODUCT_NAME IN (#{product1},#{product2},#{product3},#{product4},#{product5})
GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME
